content.json: ðŸ’¡_The **Subscription** parameter determines the scope of information displayed in the environment and management score tabs._
[![Azure](https://azure.microsoft.com/svghandler/preview/)](https://azure.microsoft.com/svghandler/preview/)

## [Customer] 
### Planning Guide for Cloud Roles and Operations Management
version 0.91b

This workbook is designed to be a living document. It represents a starting point for developing a cloud roles and operations management framework.

Management tasks can be automated (IaC, policy, alert rules, etc) or manual. Both of these modes are represented in this workbook. It should be noted that even automated tasks need initial definition and routine review.

author: FastTrack for Azure

The Task tab allows pivoting to the below catgories: - **Foundation Tasks** : Generic tasks that apply broadly to all resources and services. - **Service Tasks** : Azure Services tasks to manage resources e.g. Azure Monitor, Defender for Cloud, etc. - **Platform Tasks** : Tasks typically associated with [platform landing zone](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/ready/landing-zone/#platform-vs-application-landing-zones) resources e.g. Azure Firewall, VNET, etc. - **Application Tasks** : Tasks typically associated with [application landing zone](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/ready/landing-zone/#platform-vs-application-landing-zones) resources e.g. App Services, Application Gateways, etc. - **Solution Tasks** : Tasks used to manage a complete solution e.g. Azure Virtual Desktop, SAP on Azure, Azure VMware services or a line-of-business system. To remove [Customer] and change it to your Organization Name, edit this workbook and use CTRL-H to replace [Customer] with your desired Organization Name.

### Change Log 

|Version|Description|Owner|
|---|---|---|
|v0.91b|Pilot version|Johan|
# {selectedTab}

Initiative definitions are aligned to the five [**Microsoft Well-Architected Framework**](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/framework/) pillars and can be used as part of a **coordinated effort to improve an area of operations**.

//totalresources
resources 
| summarize resourcetotal=count()
| project key=1, resourcetotal
| join
//distinct resources with an advisor recommendation
(advisorresources
| where type == 'microsoft.advisor/recommendations'
| distinct tostring(properties.impactedValue)
| summarize advisoraffectedresourcetotal=count()
| project key=1, advisoraffectedresourcetotal) on key
//what % resources of total resources do not have a recommendation? == the advisor management score
| project pctnotaffected=toint(100-(toreal(advisoraffectedresourcetotal)/toreal(resourcetotal))*100), resourcetotal, advisoraffectedresourcetotal, key
content.title: Azure Advisor

content.query:
resources
| where type in~ ('microsoft.compute/virtualmachines','microsoft.classiccompute/virtualmachines') 
| extend resourceId=tolower(id) 
| join kind = leftouter ( recoveryservicesresources
| where type == "microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults/backupfabrics/protectioncontainers/protecteditems"
| where properties.backupManagementType == "AzureIaasVM"
| project resourceId = tolower(tostring(properties.sourceResourceId)), backupItemid = id, isBackedUp = isnotempty(id) ) on resourceId 
| extend isProtected = isnotempty(backupItemid)
| project id,name,resourceGroup,location,tags, tostring(isProtected)
//| summarize count() by isProtected
| summarize
    VMTotal=toreal(count(id)),
    Protected=toreal(dcountif(id, isProtected=="True")),
    Unprotected=toreal(dcountif(id, isProtected=="False"))
| project pctNotBackedUp=toint((Unprotected/VMTotal)*100), pctBackedUp=toint((Protected/VMTotal)*100), VMTotal, Protected, Unprotected, key=1
content.title: Azure Backup

content.query:
//if fired alerts <> 0, with less than 20% closed, then flag1 is true -33.3%
//if fired alerts <> 0, with less than 50% acknowledged, then flag2 is true -33.3%
//if total alerts i.e. Fired  > than 1 (alert) * resource total then flag3 is true -33.3%
//100-flag1-flag2-flag3 = alert management score
//totalresources
resources 
| summarize resourcetotal=count()
| project key=1, resourcetotal
| join
(alertsmanagementresources | where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| extend startDateTime=properties.essentials.startDateTime
| where startDateTime > ago(30d)
| extend State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| extend monitorCondition=tostring(properties.essentials.monitorCondition)
| summarize 
    TotalAlerts=count(), 
    New=countif(State=="New"), 
    Acknowledged=countif(State=="Acknowledged"), 
    Closed=countif(State=="Closed"), 
    Fired=countif(monitorCondition=="Fired"),
    Resolved=countif(monitorCondition=="Resolved")
| project TotalAlerts, New, Acknowledged, Closed, Fired, Resolved, pctClosed=toint((toreal(Closed)/toreal(Fired))*100), pctAck=toint((toreal(Acknowledged)/toreal(Fired))*100), key=1) on key
| project 
    resourcetotal, TotalAlerts, New, Acknowledged, Closed, Fired, Resolved, pctClosed, pctAck,
    Flag1=toreal(iff(pctClosed < 20, -33.3, 0.0)), Flag2=toreal(iff(pctAck < 50, -33.3, 0.0)), Flag3=toreal(iff(Fired > resourcetotal, -33.3, 0.0)) 
| project MonMgmtScore=100+toint(Flag1+Flag2+Flag3), resourcetotal, TotalAlerts, New, Acknowledged, Closed, Fired, Resolved, pctClosed, pctAck, Flag1, Flag2, Flag3, key=1
content.title: Azure Monitor

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
| extend status = properties.status.code
| project tostring(status)
| summarize
    TotalRecommendations=countif(status <> ""),
    HealthyRecommendations=countif(status == "Healthy"),
    UnhealthyRecommendations=countif(status == "Unhealthy"),
    NotApplicableRecommendations=countif(status == "NotApplicable")
| project 
    TotalRecommendations, HealthyRecommendations, UnhealthyRecommendations, NotApplicableRecommendations, 
    TotalMinNARecommendations=toreal(HealthyRecommendations)+toreal(UnhealthyRecommendations)
| project 
    pctHealthy=toint((toreal(HealthyRecommendations)/toreal(TotalMinNARecommendations))*100), TotalRecommendations,
    TotalMinNARecommendations, HealthyRecommendations, UnhealthyRecommendations, NotApplicableRecommendations, key=1
content.title: Defender for Cloud

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime {timerange:value}
| summarize 
    Count=count(), 
    New=countif(Status=="New"), 
    Active=countif(Status=="Active"), 
    Closed=countif(Status=="Closed")
| project Total=New+Active+Closed, New, Active, Closed, Good=Active+Closed
| project 
Total, New, Active, Closed, pctClosed=toint((toreal(Closed)/toreal(Total))*100), pctAct=toint((toreal(Active)/toreal(Total))*100), pctNew=toint((toreal(New)/toreal(Total))*100), pctGood=toint((toreal(Good)/toreal(Total))*100)
| project 
Total, New, Active, Closed, pctClosed, pctAct, pctNew, pctGood
//Flag1=toreal(iff(pctClosed < 25, -33.3, 0.0)), Flag2=toreal(iff(pctAct < 25, -33.3, 0.0)), 
| project 
pctGood, Total, New, Active, Closed, key=1

securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
| where name == "4ab6e3c5-74dd-8b35-9ab9-f61b30875b27"
| extend state = tostring(properties.status.code)

//| summarize ResourcesCount = count() by tostring(state)

    NotApplicableOffByPolicy=countif(tostring(cause)=="OffByPolicy"),

    NotApplicable=countif(tostring(state)=="NotApplicable")
| project pctUMScore=toint(((toreal(Healthy)+toreal(NotApplicableOffByPolicy))/toreal(Total))*100), pctUnhealthy=toint((toreal(Unhealthy)/toreal(Total))*100), pctNotApplicable=toint((toreal(NotApplicable)/toreal(Total))*100), Total, Healthy, Unhealthy, NotApplicable, NotApplicableOffByPolicy, NotApplicableVmNotReportingHB, key=1

//totalresources
resources 
| summarize resourcetotal=count()
| project key=1, resourcetotal
| join
//distinct resources with an advisor recommendation
(advisorresources
| where type == 'microsoft.advisor/recommendations'
| distinct tostring(properties.impactedValue)
| summarize advisoraffectedresourcetotal=count()
| project key=1, advisoraffectedresourcetotal) on key
//what % resources of total resources do not have a recommendation? == the advisor management score
| project pctnotaffected=toint(100-(toreal(advisoraffectedresourcetotal)/toreal(resourcetotal))*100), resourcetotal, advisoraffectedresourcetotal
content.title: Azure Advisor

content.query:
resources
| where type in~ ('microsoft.compute/virtualmachines','microsoft.classiccompute/virtualmachines') 
| extend resourceId=tolower(id) 
| join kind = leftouter ( recoveryservicesresources
| where type == "microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults/backupfabrics/protectioncontainers/protecteditems"
| where properties.backupManagementType == "AzureIaasVM"
| project resourceId = tolower(tostring(properties.sourceResourceId)), backupItemid = id, isBackedUp = isnotempty(id) ) on resourceId 
| extend isProtected = isnotempty(backupItemid)
| project id,name,resourceGroup,location,tags, tostring(isProtected)
//| summarize count() by isProtected
| summarize
    VMTotal=toreal(count(id)),
    Protected=toreal(dcountif(id, isProtected=="True")),
    Unprotected=toreal(dcountif(id, isProtected=="False"))
| project pctNotBackedUp=toint((Unprotected/VMTotal)*100), pctBackedUp=toint((Protected/VMTotal)*100), VMTotal, Protected, Unprotected
content.title: Azure Backup

content.query:
//if fired alerts <> 0, with less than 20% closed, then flag1 is true -33.3%
//if fired alerts <> 0, with less than 50% acknowledged, then flag2 is true -33.3%
//if total alerts i.e. Fired  > than 1 (alert) * resource total then flag3 is true -33.3%
//100-flag1-flag2-flag3 = alert management score
//totalresources
resources 
| summarize resourcetotal=count()
| project key=1, resourcetotal
| join
(alertsmanagementresources | where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| extend startDateTime=properties.essentials.startDateTime
| where startDateTime > ago(30d)
| extend State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| extend monitorCondition=tostring(properties.essentials.monitorCondition)
| summarize 
    TotalAlerts=count(), 
    New=countif(State=="New"), 
    Acknowledged=countif(State=="Acknowledged"), 
    Closed=countif(State=="Closed"), 
    Fired=countif(monitorCondition=="Fired"),
    Resolved=countif(monitorCondition=="Resolved")
| project TotalAlerts, New, Acknowledged, Closed, Fired, Resolved, pctClosed=toint((toreal(Closed)/toreal(Fired))*100), pctAck=toint((toreal(Acknowledged)/toreal(Fired))*100), key=1) on key
| project 
    resourcetotal, TotalAlerts, New, Acknowledged, Closed, Fired, Resolved, pctClosed, pctAck,
    Flag1=toreal(iff(pctClosed < 20, -33.3, 0.0)), Flag2=toreal(iff(pctAck < 50, -33.3, 0.0)), Flag3=toreal(iff(Fired > resourcetotal, -33.3, 0.0)) 
| project MonMgmtScore=100+toint(Flag1+Flag2+Flag3), resourcetotal, TotalAlerts, New, Acknowledged, Closed, Fired, Resolved, pctClosed, pctAck, Flag1, Flag2, Flag3

content.json:
[Customer] implemented the below [operating model](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/operating-model/compare) to support its cloud operations.

| Capability/Team  |Description  | 
| ------------ | ------------ |
|[Cloud Adoption (CA)](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/organize/cloud-adoption)	|Deliver technical solutions. Modern-day equivalent of technical implementation teams or project teams.
|[Cloud Strategy (CS)](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/organize/cloud-strategy)	|Responsible for leading cloud adoption within the organization, supporting all business outcomes, people and process changes and technical projects.
|[Cloud Operations (CO)](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/organize/cloud-operations)	|Focus on delivering maximum workload performance and minimum business interruptions within an agreed-upon operations budget.
|[Cloud Center of Excellence (CCoE)](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/organize/cloud-center-of-excellence)	|Improve quality, speed, and resiliency of adoption.
|[Cloud Governance (CG)](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/organize/cloud-governance)	|Manage risk, drive consistency, governance, and compliance.
|[Cloud Platform (CP)](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/organize/cloud-platform)	|Operate and mature the platform. Creation and support of the cloud platform or landing zones.
|[Cloud Automation (CAU)](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/organize/cloud-automation)	|Accelerate adoption and innovation. The primary duty of cloud automation is to own and advance the solution catalog. The solution catalog is a collection of prebuilt solutions or automation templates.

links.linkLabel: [Customer] Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery Plan

content.json:
#### Enterprise Landing Zone

[![Azure](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/ready/enterprise-scale/media/ns-arch-cust-expanded.png#lightbox)](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/ready/enterprise-scale/media/ns-arch-cust-expanded.png#lightbox)

The [Customer] cross-team responsible, accountable, consulted, and informed (RACI) matrix is based on the [Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework RACI sample](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/microsoft/CloudAdoptionFramework/master/organize/raci-template.xlsx).
[![Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/raci.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/raci.png)

A well-managed cloud is one that is managed for all of the below items. These items represent an expansion of the 5 pillars of the [**Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework**](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/architecture/framework/?WT.mc_id=Portal-fx), and are suggested as a framework for managing Azure environments.

Activities, alerts and policies for managing **services**, **platform** resources, **application** resources and **solutions** are presented for these items in this workbook.

## Compliant
Services that can be used to manage compliance in Azure include:
- Azure Devops Services
- Github
- Azure Policy
- Defender for Cloud
- Azure Monitor
- Azure Resource Graph
- In-guest VM Policy
- Desired State Configuration

[![Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/compliant.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/compliant.png)

## Observable
Services that can be used to manage observability in Azure include:
- Azure Monitor
- Log Analytics
- Microsoft Sentinel
- Defender for Cloud
- AAD Audit and Sign-in
- Activity Log
- Network Watcher

[![Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/observable.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/observable.png)

## Recoverable
Services that can be used to manage recovery in Azure include:
- Backup
- Site Recovery
- Devops Redeploy

[![Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/recoverable.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/recoverable.png)

## Reliable
Services that can be used to manage reliability in Azure include:
- Advisor
- Chaos Studio
- Azure Monitor
- Log Analytics
- Workbooks
- Alerts that prevent downtime or reduce MTTR

[![Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/reliable.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/reliable.png)

## Performant
Services that can be used to manage performance in Azure include:
- Advisor
- Azure Monitor
- Log Analytics
- Microsoft Sentinel
- Metrics
- Workbooks
- Network Watcher

[![Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/performant.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/performant.png)

## Updateable
Services that can be used to manage updates in Azure include:
- Advisor
- Customer managed via UM and LAWS
- Planned maintenance (Service Health)
- Devops Update

[![Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/updateable.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/updateable.png)

## Cost Managed
Services that can be used to manage cost in Azure include:
- Advisor
- Cost Management & Billing
- EA Portal (Account hierarchy, credit balance, cost for each department, account, and subscription)


[![Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/cost.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/cost.png)

## Secured
Services that can be used to manage security in Azure include:
- Advisor
- AAD
- MFA
- CA
- PIM
- Role Entitlement
- Policy
- In-Guest Policy
- Network Watcher
- Defender for Cloud
- Microsoft Sentinel
- Key Vault
- DDoS
- NSG

[![Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/secure.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/secure.png)

## Inventoried
Services that can be used to manage inventory in Azure include:
- Resource graph
- Defender for Cloud (Inventory)
- Automation (Change Tracking & Inventory)

[![Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/inventory.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/inventory.png)

## Operational Excellence
Services that can be used to provide operational excellence in Azure include:
- Advisor
- People
- Process
- RACI
- Dashboards
- Reports
- Reviews
- Automation (AA, LA, Functions)

[![Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/operationalexcellence.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/operationalexcellence.png)

### Example 1: Azure Virtual Desktop
The diagram below is a visual representation of the tags with tasks (activities, alerts and policies) applied to the management of an Azure Virtual Desktop solution.

### Example 2: ExpressRoute
The diagram below is a visual representation of the tags with tasks (activities, alerts and policies) applied to the management of an ExpressRoute circuit.
[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/avd.png)
[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/cloud-rolesandops/main/images/exr.png)

This section provides an extensive list of activities, alerts and policies that should be considered in an operations plan.

While it may not be feasible to perform all tasks, any critical applications and business processes that rely on Azure resources should be comprehensively managed for their availability, performance, security and operation.

content.json: The number of active recommendations, alerts, incidents, missing updates, unprotected entities, the compliance state and secure score are used to get an indication of the management that is performed in the environment.

parameters.name: selectedTab
parameters.label: Select a technology
parameters.jsonData:
[[
 { "value": "Azure Advisor", "label": "Azure Advisor", "selected":true },
 {"value": "Azure Backup", "label": "Azure Backup"},
 {"value": "Azure Monitor", "label": "Azure Monitor"},
 {"value": "Azure Policy", "label": "Azure Policy"},
 {"value": "Azure Site Recovery", "label": "Azure Site Recovery"},
 {"value": "Azure Update Management", "label": "Azure Update Management"},
 {"value": "Defender for Cloud", "label": "Defender for Cloud"},
 {"value": "Microsoft Sentinel", "label": "Microsoft Sentinel"}
]

content.json: ## {selectedTab}

content.query:
advisorresources
| where type == 'microsoft.advisor/recommendations'
| distinct tostring(properties.shortDescription.problem)
| summarize count()
content.title: All Recommendations

content.query:
advisorresources
| where type == 'microsoft.advisor/recommendations'
| extend Category = tostring(properties.category)
| extend Category = replace('HighAvailability', 'Reliability', Category)
| extend Description = tostring(properties.shortDescription.problem)
| extend ImpactedField = tostring(properties.impactedField)
| extend ImpactedValue = tostring(properties.impactedValue)
| extend Impact = tostring(properties.impact)
| extend LastUpdated = tostring(properties.lastUpdated)
| project Impact, ImpactedField, ImpactedValue, Description, resourceGroup, subscriptionId, Category, LastUpdated
| summarize Count = count() by Category
content.title: Category (by affected resource)

content.query:
advisorresources
| where type == 'microsoft.advisor/recommendations'
| extend Category = tostring(properties.category)
| extend Category = replace('HighAvailability', 'Reliability', Category)
| extend Description = tostring(properties.shortDescription.problem)
| extend ImpactedField = tostring(properties.impactedField)
| extend ImpactedValue = tostring(properties.impactedValue)
| extend Impact = tostring(properties.impact)
| extend LastUpdated = tostring(properties.lastUpdated)
| project Impact, ImpactedField, ImpactedValue, Description, resourceGroup, subscriptionId, Category, LastUpdated
| summarize Count = count() by Impact
content.title: Impact Level (by affected resource)

content.query:
advisorresources
| where type == 'microsoft.advisor/recommendations'
| extend Category = tostring(properties.category)
| extend Category = replace('HighAvailability', 'Reliability', Category)
| extend Description = tostring(properties.shortDescription.problem)
| extend ImpactedField = tostring(properties.impactedField)
| extend ImpactedValue = tostring(properties.impactedValue)
| extend Impact = tostring(properties.impact)
| extend LastUpdated = tostring(properties.lastUpdated)
| where Impact in ({impactlevel})
| project Impact, Description, subscriptionId, Category, ImpactedField, ImpactedValue, resourceGroup, LastUpdated
| sort by Impact asc

resources
| where type in ('microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces',
 'microsoft.insights/actiongroups',
 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/actionrules',
 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/smartdetectoralertrules',
 'microsoft.insights/activitylogalerts',
 'microsoft.insights/metricalerts',
 'microsoft.insights/autoscalesettings',
 'microsoft.insights/components',
 'microsoft.insights/datacollectionrules',
 'microsoft.insights/datacollectionendpoints',
 'microsoft.insights/privatelinkscopes',
 'microsoft.insights/scheduledqueryrules',
 'microsoft.operationalinsights/querypacks',
 'microsoft.insights/webtests',
 'microsoft.insights/workbooks')
| summarize count() by type
content.title: Azure Monitor Resources

parameters.name: sev
parameters.label: Severity
parameters.query:
AlertsManagementResources | where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| where todatetime(properties.essentials.startDateTime) > ago(30d)
| extend severity=tostring(properties.essentials.severity)
| distinct severity

content.query:
AlertsManagementResources | where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| where todatetime(properties.essentials.startDateTime) {timerange:value}
| extend State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| extend monitorCondition=tostring(properties.essentials.monitorCondition)
| summarize Count=count(), New=countif(State=="New"), 
Acknowledged=countif(State=="Acknowledged"), 
Closed=countif(State=="Closed"), 
Fired=countif(monitorCondition=="Fired"),
Resolved=countif(monitorCondition=="Resolved")
by Severity=tostring(properties.essentials.severity)
| order by Severity asc
| project Severity, New, Acknowledged, Closed, Fired, Resolved
| where Severity in ({sev})

AlertsManagementResources | where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| where todatetime(properties.essentials.startDateTime) {timerange:value}
| extend state=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| extend severity=tostring(properties.essentials.severity)
| extend monitorCondition=tostring(properties.essentials.monitorCondition)
| extend targetResource=tostring(properties.essentials.targetResource)
| extend description=tostring(properties.essentials.description)
| extend startDateTime=tostring(properties.essentials.startDateTime)
| extend monitorConditionResolvedDateTime=tostring(properties.essentials.monitorConditionResolvedDateTime)
| project subscriptionId, id, name, state, severity, resourceGroup, monitorCondition, targetResource, startDateTime, monitorConditionResolvedDateTime, description
| where severity in ({sev})

PolicyResources
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.PolicyInsights/PolicyStates'
| extend complianceState = tostring(properties.complianceState)
| extend
	resourceId = tostring(properties.resourceId),
	policyAssignmentId = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentId),
	policyAssignmentScope = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentScope),
	policyAssignmentName = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentName),
	policyDefinitionId = tostring(properties.policyDefinitionId),
	policyDefinitionReferenceId = tostring(properties.policyDefinitionReferenceId),
	stateWeight = iff(complianceState == 'NonCompliant', int(300), iff(complianceState == 'Compliant', int(200), iff(complianceState == 'Conflict', int(100), iff(complianceState == 'Exempt', int(50), int(0)))))
| summarize max(stateWeight) by resourceId, policyAssignmentId, policyAssignmentScope, policyAssignmentName
| summarize counts = count() by policyAssignmentId, policyAssignmentScope, max_stateWeight, policyAssignmentName
| summarize overallStateWeight = max(max_stateWeight),
nonCompliantCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 300),
compliantCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 200),
conflictCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 100),
exemptCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 50) by policyAssignmentId, policyAssignmentScope, policyAssignmentName
| extend totalResources = todouble(nonCompliantCount + compliantCount + conflictCount + exemptCount)
| extend compliancePercentage = iff(totalResources == 0, todouble(100), 100 * todouble(compliantCount + exemptCount) / totalResources)
| project policyAssignmentName, scope = policyAssignmentScope,
complianceState = iff(overallStateWeight == 300, 'noncompliant', iff(overallStateWeight == 200, 'compliant', iff(overallStateWeight == 100, 'conflict', iff(overallStateWeight == 50, 'exempt', 'notstarted')))),
compliancePercentage,
compliantCount,
nonCompliantCount,
conflictCount,
exemptCount
| order by scope desc
content.title: Compliance by policy assignment

content.query:
PolicyResources
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.PolicyInsights/PolicyStates'
| extend complianceState = tostring(properties.complianceState)
| extend
	resourceId = tostring(properties.resourceId),
	resourceType = tolower(tostring(properties.resourceType)),
	policyAssignmentId = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentId),
	policyDefinitionId = tostring(properties.policyDefinitionId),
	policyDefinitionReferenceId = tostring(properties.policyDefinitionReferenceId),
	stateWeight = iff(complianceState == 'NonCompliant', int(300), iff(complianceState == 'Compliant', int(200), iff(complianceState == 'Conflict', int(100), iff(complianceState == 'Exempt', int(50), int(0)))))
| summarize max(stateWeight) by resourceId, resourceType
| summarize counts = count() by resourceType, max_stateWeight
| summarize overallStateWeight = max(max_stateWeight),
nonCompliantCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 300),
compliantCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 200),
conflictCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 100),
exemptCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 50) by resourceType
| extend totalResources = todouble(nonCompliantCount + compliantCount + conflictCount + exemptCount)
| extend compliancePercentage = iff(totalResources == 0, todouble(100), 100 * todouble(compliantCount + exemptCount) / totalResources)
| project resourceType,
overAllComplianceState = iff(overallStateWeight == 300, 'noncompliant', iff(overallStateWeight == 200, 'compliant', iff(overallStateWeight == 100, 'conflict', iff(overallStateWeight == 50, 'exempt', 'notstarted')))),
compliancePercentage,
compliantCount,
nonCompliantCount,
conflictCount,
exemptCount
| order by resourceType desc
content.title: Compliance by resource type

content.query:
resources
| where type in ('microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults')
| summarize count() by type
content.title: Azure Backup Resources

content.query:
Resources
| where type in~ ('microsoft.compute/virtualmachines','microsoft.classiccompute/virtualmachines') 
| extend resourceId=tolower(id) 
| join kind = leftouter ( RecoveryServicesResources
| where type == "microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults/backupfabrics/protectioncontainers/protecteditems"
| where properties.backupManagementType == "AzureIaasVM"
| project resourceId = tolower(tostring(properties.sourceResourceId)), backupItemid = id, isBackedUp = isnotempty(id) ) on resourceId 
| extend isProtected = isnotempty(backupItemid)
| project id,name,resourceGroup,location,tags, tostring(isProtected)
| extend isProtected = replace("False", "Unprotected", isProtected)
| extend isProtected = replace("True", "Protected", isProtected)
| summarize count() by isProtected
content.title: Virtual Machine Protection

content.query:
resources
| where type in~ ('microsoft.compute/virtualmachines','microsoft.classiccompute/virtualmachines') 
| extend resourceId=tolower(id) 
| join kind = leftouter ( recoveryservicesresources
| where type == "microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults/backupfabrics/protectioncontainers/protecteditems"
| where properties.backupManagementType == "AzureIaasVM"
| project subscriptionId, resourceId = tolower(tostring(properties.sourceResourceId)), backupItemid = id, isBackedUp = isnotempty(id) ) on resourceId 
| extend isProtected = isnotempty(backupItemid)
| project tostring(isProtected), subscriptionId,id,name,resourceGroup,location,tags

securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
  | where properties.Status in ('Active')
  | where properties.Severity in ('Low', 'Medium', 'High')
  | extend SeverityRank = case(
    properties.Severity == 'High', 3,
    properties.Severity == 'Medium', 2,
    properties.Severity == 'Low', 1,
    0
   )
  | project-away SeverityRank
  | extend Severity = properties.Severity
  | project Severity = tostring(Severity)
  | summarize Count = count() by Severity
content.title: Alerts by Severity

content.query:
securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
    | extend Prop = parse_json(properties)
  | extend AlertDisplayName = Prop.["AlertDisplayName"]
  | project tostring(AlertDisplayName)
  | summarize AlertCount = count() by AlertDisplayName
  | sort by AlertCount
content.title: Alerts

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
| extend resourceId = properties.resourceDetails.Id
| extend resourceName = tostring(split(resourceId, "/")[8])
| extend resourceGroup = (split(resourceId, "/")[4])
| extend status = properties.status.code
| extend recommendatioName = properties.displayName 
| project subscriptionId,
		  status,
          resourceId,
		  recommendatioName,
		  resourceName
content.title: Recommendations by State

content.query:
SecurityResources
| where type == 'microsoft.security/securescores'
| project subscriptionId,
	subscriptionTotal = iff(properties.score.max == 0, 0.00, round(tolong(properties.weight) * todouble(properties.score.current)/tolong(properties.score.max),2)),
	weight = tolong(iff(properties.weight == 0, 1, properties.weight))
| join kind=leftouter (
	ResourceContainers
	| where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' and properties.state == 'Enabled'
	| project subscriptionId, mgChain=properties.managementGroupAncestorsChain )
	on subscriptionId
| mv-expand mg=mgChain
| summarize sumSubs = sum(subscriptionTotal), sumWeight = sum(weight), resultsNum = count() by tostring(mg.displayName), mgId = tostring(mg.name)
| extend secureScore = iff(tolong(resultsNum) == 0, 404.00, round(sumSubs/sumWeight*100,2))
| project toint(secureScore), mgName=mg_displayName
| sort by secureScore asc
content.title: Secure Score by Management Group

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime {timerange:value}
| summarize 
    Count=count(), 
    New=countif(Status=="New"), 
    Active=countif(Status=="Active"), 
    Closed=countif(Status=="Closed")
by Severity
| order by New desc
| project Severity, New, Active, Closed

SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime {timerange:value}
| extend Owner = Owner.assignedTo
| sort by TimeGenerated
| project CreatedTime, ClosedTime, IncidentNumber, Title, Status, Severity, Owner, IncidentUrl, ProviderName

securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
| where name == "4ab6e3c5-74dd-8b35-9ab9-f61b30875b27"
| project state = tostring(properties.status.code)
| summarize ResourcesCount = count() by tostring(state)

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments/subassessments"
| extend assessmentKey = extract(".*assessments/(.+?)/.*",1,  id)
// Comment to identify the guid
| where assessmentKey == "4ab6e3c5-74dd-8b35-9ab9-f61b30875b27" 
| where properties.status.code =~ 'Unhealthy'
|Â project ResourceId = substring(id,Â 0,Â indexof(id,Â '/providers/Microsoft.Security')), subscriptionId, ResourceGroup = substring(id,Â 0,Â indexof(id,Â '/providers'))
| summarize VMcount = dcount(ResourceId) by ResourceGroup, subscriptionId
| order by VMcount desc
